title: 105_hr119
content: Protecting American Workers Act of 1997 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to the following conditions of H-1B nonimmigrant employment: (1) compensation level, (2) US worker displacement and recruitment, (3)H-1B worker dependence, (4) job contractors, (5) misrepresentation penalties, (6) period of admission, and (7) foreign residence requirement.
